thread.title: Fantastic stay / Un super hôtel / Polecamy
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay / Un super hôtel / Polecamy - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Marie M
title: Fantastic stay / Un super hôtel / Polecamy
text:
-The location is wonderful (near borough market and few minutes to Tower Bridge). There are tons of nice places near the hotel and you can go by foot to Westminster to enjoy London fully.
-Breakfast is the best thing ever. Not only it's yummy it's also cheap. The best value to spend a great day in London!
-The staff was super nice! Especially the night staff: Champagne, Marius, Bintou, Majid ( and the guy who helped us with the USB cable). I do not remember everybody's name (sorry) but the team made a fantastic job and we'll definitely come back thanks to them :D
-Being able to take a bath after walking all the day was very appreciated.
-There are lots of parcs and playground in the area. Very nice time for kids.
